problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的切线,C为切点,∠B=25°,则∠D等于()
answer: 解:如右图,连接OC,∵AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的切线,∴CD⊥OC,∵∠B=25°,∴∠AOC=50°,∴∠D=40°．故选:D．
comment: 本题主要考查了圆周角定理、切线的性质,解题的关键是求出∠AOC的度数．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is the tangent of ⊙O, C is the tangent point, ∠B = N_0, then ∠D is equal to ()
